A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Well...I went and seen it today. And I’m a little confused on where all of this is going. I really wanted to like it\, and I do...and then I don’t. lol! It’s all over the place for me. It had its good moments\, then it got lost again. I never felt I bonded with any of the characters. At least not any of the new ones. The special affects are always amazing\, but the story line was a little blah for me.
